title: Hidden Creek Again
description: THE RETURN OF #HCH IS HERE!  Forget Aira and Wes...  ...and meet Nova and Elijah  He's the 'summer boy' She's the 'surfer girl'  Their summers are memories, and nothing more.  Elijah is only back in Hidden for one thing: REVENGE.  Nova wants NOTHING to do with him - and for good reason.  But what happens when unfinished feelings explode?  (THIS BOOK MUST BE READ AFTER THE FIRST FOUR HCH BOOKS!)
author: Jaxson Kidman
